name: Mayhem!
description:
———
The year is 2027: Crime remains high and pollution levels are rising. So what’s the good news? MAYHEM! has become the World’s No.1 game show. And now… no-one really dies!
———

MAYHEM! is a frantic, frenzied 2D arcade game exclusive to iOS.

Dodge lasers, sidestep mines and collect cash pickups in the Global Smash Hit Game Show: MAYHEM! 

Can you beat the clock to conquer all Zones, become the ultimate contestant, unlock Endless Mode and top the leaderboard?

Warning: As with all the best arcade games, some players might find MAYHEM! EXTREMELY DIFFICULT!

MAYHEM! features pixel art from leading UK artist, Gary J Lucken - Army of Trolls;

Plus:
= 3 x MAYHEM! Zones (Twilight, Danger & The End)
= 1 x Endless Zone
= 12 Cheeky Achievements
= Left & Right handed controls
= Game Center Enabled (of course! - it’s a game after all)
= Soundtrack by Grandscale Music

*** No Ads. No IAPs. 100% Indie.

Please show your support by rating MAYHEM!

Thank you.
DEADJAM
